alert.note: Alert for Boone; Cabell; Kanawha; Lincoln; Putnam (West Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 28 at 2:43PM EDT until July 28 at 3:15PM EDT by NWS Charleston
info.description: The National Weather Service in Charleston West Virginia has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Cabell County in central West Virginia... West central Kanawha County in central West Virginia... Southern Putnam County in western West Virginia... Lincoln County in central West Virginia... Northwestern Boone County in central West Virginia... * Until 315 PM EDT. * At 243 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Hamlin, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Nitro, Winfield, Hamlin, St. Albans, Hurricane, Barboursville, Milton, Poca, Ona, Culloden, Spurlockville, Tornado, Alum Creek, Julian, Teays Valley, Cross Lanes, West Hamlin, Bancroft, Salt Rock, and Palermo. This includes the following highways... Interstate 64 in West Virginia between mile markers 19 and 48. Route 119 between mile markers 55 and 68. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
